name: VariableVesselVasculitis
title: Variable Vessel Vasculitis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to variable vessel vasculitis.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes variable vessel vasculitis (e.g., Behcet syndrome).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes small (e.g., IgA vasculitis (Henoch-Schonlein purpura)), medium (e.g., polyarteritis nodosa) and large vessel vasculitis (e.g., giant cell arteritis), vasculitis associated with systemic disease (e.g., Lupus vasculitis), and vasculitis associated with probable etiology (e.g., cancer-associated vasculitis).)
